Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 46th overall pick, by Penn in 1969...
Injured on 6/16/1969 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1974, off Bill Cook (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/12/1974, off Logan Maberry (LP)...
Won World Championship with Penn in 1974...
Traded from Penn to Boston (UBA) on 1/31/1975 (Going to PEN: 1B J. Green. Going to PIL: P R. Stiff, C C. Maddux, SS W. Thompson)...
Drove in 6 runs against Penn on 4/5/1977...
Injured on 4/21/1978 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
